questions.text: America is known as the land of opportunity.
Thousands of people immigrate to the United States every year.
America is one big melting pot of different cultures.
The California Institute of Technology is a top world ranked college.
The buildings at Harvard date all the way back to the year 1636.
Harvard is located in the state of Massachusetts.
UCLA is another institute worthy of recognition.
America is also known for its freedom.
We now live in a land of equal opportunity.
America is the best place to be at to achieve these dreams.
The Fourth of July is the United States\' celebration of its independence.
Independence Day celebrations include firework shows held by various organizations.
The shows are held at stadiums, recreational parks, and private homes.
Americans hold this day as one of the most revered holidays in the country.
Another Fourth of July tradition is the backyard barbeque.
The Fourth of July occurs in the middle of summer.
Americans love to grill outdoors to avoid the heat inside the house.
There is nothing better than a great American meal on the Fourth of July.
The firework shows at stadiums attract a large number of people.
Fourth of July is a holiday that has great meaning to most Americans.
The United States government is composed of three major sections.
The three parts are the executive, legislative, and judicial branches.
This system ensures that no branch can carry more power than the other.
The executive branch is the branch that most Americans are familiar with.
It includes the president, the vice-president, and the cabinet.
The president is the leader of the country.
The president is the commander-in-chief of the U.S. military.
The cabinet acts as agents of the president.
If the president is removed from office, the vice-president will act as president.
The legislative branch consists of the House of Representatives and the Senate.
Christmas is observed on December 25 in many countries in the world.
Christmas is a Christian holiday that celebrates the birth of Jesus Christ.
Christians throughout the world go to church on Christmas.
Many people put up and decorate a Christmas tree.
The tree can be a real evergreen or it can be an artificial tree.
Lights, strings, and tinsel can be used to decorate a Christmas tree.
On the top of the tree is a star or an angel.
On Christmas Day children usually wake up early to look for their presents.
On Christmas Eve many children leave milk and cookies for Santa.
According to the legend, a man named Santa Claus leaves presents under the tree.
New Year\'s Day is a national holiday in the United States.
New Year\'s Day begins when people yell "Happy New Year" at midnight.
Sometimes at the stroke of midnight couples often kiss.
The most famous New Year\'s celebration takes place in New York City\'s Time Square.
A huge crystal ball drops at midnight in front of millions of people.
Millions of people watch the celebration on television.
Many people wake up on New Year\'s Day with a hangover.
New Year\'s Day is also when many people start on their New Year\'s resolutions.
A resolution is a promise to change a lifestyle habit.
The most common resolution is to lose weight.
The third Monday in January is an American federal holiday.
The holiday is known as Martin Luther King Jr. Day.
On Martin Luther King Jr. Day, federal, state, and local offices are closed.
Public schools and post offices are also closed on this federal holiday.
Many people participate in marches and vigils remembering Dr. King.
Some states didn\'t want to honor Dr. King.
Martin Luther King Jr. Day became a holiday in 1983.
Efforts to create a King Holiday began the same year King was killed.
The first state to recognize King Day as a holiday was Illinois.
The last state to recognize the holiday was Arizona.
Valentine\'s Day is a holiday that celebrates love and friendship.
Most people think of Valentine\'s Day as a romantic day.
Couples purchase each other cards and gifts to show their love.
Valentine\'s Day is an extremely commercial holiday.
People spend money on flowers, chocolate, stuffed animals, and jewelry.
Valentine\'s Day is even celebrated by school children.
Valentine\'s Day is a great day to announce your love.
Some people get married on Valentine\'s Day.
You don\'t have to be in love to share in the festivities.
You can say "Happy Valentine\'s Day" to friends and coworkers.
Saint Patrick\'s Day is a Christian religious holiday.
Saint Patrick\'s Day celebrates the patron saint of Ireland.
According to the legend, St. Patrick drove all the snakes out of Ireland.
St. Patrick\'s Day has become a day to celebrate Irish culture.
In major cities across the country there are parades and festivals.
People wear green and decorate with shamrocks.
In the United States, St. Patrick\'s Day is not a legal holiday.
The biggest and oldest parade takes place in New York City.
St. Patrick\'s Day has become associated with drinking alcohol.
Many people feel like the holiday celebrates stereotypes about the Irish.
Passover is a Jewish holiday that commemorates their liberation from slavery.
It is traditionally celebrated in the spring and lasts about a week.
According to the Bible, God punished ancient Egypt with 10 plagues.
Jewish people were told to mark their doors with lamb\'s blood.
God would know to pass over these houses and not kill any first born males inside.
This is where the name of the holiday Passover comes from.
There are very specific rituals that happen at the Seder meal.
These rituals are all in a book called the Haggadah.
Inside the Haggadah is the story of the Jewish exodus from Egypt.
During the Seder meal, parts of the Haggadah are read aloud.
Easter is a Christian holiday that celebrates the resurrection of Jesus Christ.
Easter is observed on a Sunday between the end of March and the end of April.
Some Christians participate in an Easter vigil or nighttime mass.
In the United States, Easter is celebrated as a secular holiday.
Easter is associated with the beginning of spring.
Easter is symbolized by bunnies, flowers, and dyed eggs.
Many children in the United States believe in the Easter Bunny.
The Easter Bunny leaves baskets full of candy for children.
These baskets are sometimes hidden and the children have to find them.
Another activity associated with Easter is an Easter egg hunt.
Mother\'s Day is a holiday that celebrates and honors mothers.
It is celebrated on the second Sunday in May.
It became an official holiday in the country at the start of the 20th century.
The holiday is celebrated in a number of ways.
People give mothers gifts like flowers, cards, and jewelry to thank them.
A popular symbol of the holiday is the carnation.
Many people take their mothers out for a special meal.
Mother\'s Day is the most popular date in the U.S. for people to go out and eat.
It is estimated that people spend billions on meals and gifts.
Many countries around the world have their own version of Mother\'s Day.
Father\'s Day is a holiday observed in the United States to honor fathers.
Father\'s Day also honors paternal figures like grandfathers, stepfathers, and uncles.
Father\'s Day is observed on the third Sunday in June.
In the early 20th century there was a mining accident in West Virginia.
A push for a day to remember the men killed was the start for Father\'s Day.
It wasn\'t until 1972 that Father\'s Day was recognized as a national holiday.
Like Mother\'s Day, it is a holiday that has become commercialized.
Father\'s Day is not a federal holiday even though it is widely celebrated.
Father\'s Day is usually celebrated with meals.
Barbecues are common since the holiday falls at the beginning of the summer.
Memorial Day is a holiday that remembers casualties of the armed forces.
The armed forces include all branches of the U.S. military.
Those branches are Army, Navy, Marines, Air Force, and Coast Guard.
Memorial Day is a federal holiday, which means post offices and schools are closed.
Memorial Day is observed on the last Monday of May.
The name Memorial Day became more widely used after World War II.
Memorial Day is commemorated by ceremonies in cemeteries across the country.
The most well-known ceremony is held in Arlington National Cemetery.
Arlington is a military cemetery, meaning only military personnel are buried there.
Volunteers place U.S. flags on military graves at the Arlington cemetery.
Labor Day is observed on the first Monday of September.
It is a holiday meant to honor the contributions of U.S. workers.
It has been an official federal holiday since 1894.
Government offices, schools, and post offices are closed on Federal Holidays.
On Labor Day there are usually parades in major cities around the country.
Politicians and labor leaders make speeches and hold press conferences.
Labor Day is also considered the unofficial end of summer.
People celebrate Labor Day with trips to the beaches, picnics, and barbecues.
Many towns and cities host fireworks on this day.
Many people also take their last summer vacations around this time.
Columbus Day is observed on the second Monday of October.
For a long time it was observed on October 12.
Christopher Columbus was an Italian sailor who sailed to claim new lands in 1492.
Some people say Columbus discovered North America, but not everyone would agree.
Columbus landed on the Caribbean islands.
Columbus Day has been a federal holiday since 1937.
Not everyone thinks Christopher Columbus should be honored.
Many people hold protests or vigils to remember the lives of Native Americans.
Native Americans were killed or enslaved as a result of the European arrival.
Another name for Columbus Day is Day of the Race.
Halloween is a holiday on October 31.
The focus is less on memories of the dearly departed or agriculture.
The holiday has its roots in a Christian holiday that remembers the dead.
Halloween is about kids dressing up in costumes and going trick-or-treating.
Homeowners give the children candy, raisins, or some other food treat.
Many families decorate their houses to prepare for the holiday.
Traditional decorations often include pumpkins with faces carved into them.
Adults on Halloween have fun by attending costume parties.
There are often contests for who has the best costume.
Other people celebrate by going to haunted houses.
Veterans Day is an official United States holiday observed on November 11.
Veterans Day honors all members of the armed forces.
If Veterans Day falls on a Sunday, then the holiday is observed the next day.
The holiday was first observed after World War I.
Veterans Day used to be called Armistice Day.
Many restaurants offer free meals to veterans on the date.
Many major cities also hold parades on this date.
One symbol of the day is the poppy flower.
The red poppy flower is said to represent the blood of soldiers.
Many people wear or give out poppy flowers on the day.
Chanuka, which can be spelled as Hanukkah, is an 8-day Jewish holiday.
This Jewish holiday is known as the Festival of Lights.
It celebrates the dedication of an ancient Jewish temple in Jerusalem.
The dates of the holiday usually occur anywhere in late November to Late December.
The main way people observe the holiday is by lighting a candle on a candelabra.
A candelabra is commonly known as a menorah.
The menorah is placed somewhere visible like in a window.
The candles are supposed to stay lit for at least 30 minutes after it gets dark.
Special prayers are said and holy songs sung when the candles are lit.
Children play with a special four-sided spinning top called a dreidel.
Thanksgiving is a holiday celebrated in the United States and Canada.
People celebrate Thanksgiving to remember the first harvest of the pilgrims.
The Native Americans helped them find food to survive their first winter.
Thanksgiving is the day you reflect upon what you are thankful for.
An important part of Thanksgiving is families coming together.
Thanksgiving is the busiest travel day of the year.
What most Thanksgiving celebrations have in common is the food.
The turkey is usually served with gravy and stuffing.
The most common pies served are sweet potato, apple, pecan, and pumpkin.
Every year the President of the United States pardons a turkey.
In the United States 43 states all have their own lottery.
A lottery is used for states to raise money.
Licensed stores sell numbered tickets, or people can choose their own numbers.
When you let a machine pick your numbers it is usually called a Quick Pick.
Many people play numbers associated with birthdates or other important numbers to them.
Money earned from selling lottery tickets goes to pay for public services.
Once a week a drawing is held where the numbers are randomly picked.
If your ticket has those numbers, you could win a cash prize.
You can play the lottery if you are 18 years or older.
Lottery winnings are taxable, meaning the amount you actually get is smaller.
Taxes are special fees charged by a government on its people.
These fees help pay for public services like police, road repair, and schools.
In the United States people have to pay national, state, and local taxes.
Income tax is a tax applied to the money a person earns in a year.
Anyone who works has to be taxed regardless of the immigration status.
Not paying income taxes could mean a fine or even jail time.
Payroll taxes are taxes that are taken out of a person\'s paycheck.
People who own houses have to pay property taxes.
Sales tax is a specific extra percentage charged on nearly all purchases.
The amount of the sales tax is different across states and cities.
Health insurance is one way to pay for health care.
Health care includes visits to the doctor, and emergency services.
People can pay for medicine directly in cash or use health insurance.
Health insurance usually means you pay less for the services.
Some companies offer health insurance plans as part of a benefits package.
Individuals also have the option of buying health insurance.
Obamacare is a recent law that makes it easier for people to get health insurance.
The law requires all Americans have health insurance by 2014.
Those that do not get health insurance by the end of the year will pay a fine.
The fine is in a form of an extra tax that is paid when filing for income taxes.
Immigration in the United States is a complicated and controversial issue.
People have come from different countries in search of a better life.
It is estimated that there are over 11 million undocumented people in America.
Millions of undocumented people have been deported.
In 2013 the U.S. Senate passed an immigration reform bill.
The law adds extra border security along the U.S.-Mexico border.
The law also made it easier for immigrants to become citizens.
The bill has been approved by the House of Representatives.
The bill has not yet been presented or voted on by Congress.
Many people are asking President Obama to take action.
The American community college system is a place for second chances.
Community colleges are two-year schools that thrived in California.
Community colleges attract students from all parts of the world.
A large population of students comes from Asia and Latin America.
These schools provide a second chance to international students.
Community colleges helped ease   returning military personnel back into   college life.
American students who did poorly   in high school can turn to community   college.
Community colleges provide a   much-needed resource for all these   students.
The best things about community   colleges is that they accept anyone at   anytime.
Students who don\'t know what to   study can try taking different classes.
Many people attend community   colleges with plans to transfer.
Students transfer\u00A0to a university to   get a bachelor\'s degree.
There are many reasons why   students start at community colleges.
Some community colleges have   transfer agreements with other   Universities.
Some students start at a community   college for a financial reason.
A university is much more expensive   than a two-year college.
Community college classes help   students develop their math and   writing skills.
Community college prepares   students to successfully graduate from   a university.
They are also a good option for   older students with families.
Attending a community college   means you can still live at home with   your parents.
Most children in the U.S. begin   school at age 5.
School often begins in Kindergarten   for most children.
Most children stay in elementary   schools till they are about 11 years   old.
Elementary schools are divided by   grades starting in first grade.
Most elementary schools go up to   fifth or sixth grade.
The focus of an elementary school is   basic academic and socialization skills.
Children learn how to read, write,   count, add, subtract, multiply, and   divide.
Students also learn the rules of   English grammar, spelling, and   vocabulary.
Children also learn basic social   studies, history, science, art, and music.
Elementary school teachers are   licensed by the state where they work.
Once a child finishes elementary   school, they go on to middle school.
The middle school is a separate   building or set of buildings.
Most students in middle school are   between the ages of 10 and 14.
Middle school usually starts with 6th   or 7th grade and ends with 8th grade.
Most students are assigned a   middle school based on where they   live.
Middle schools provide a transition   between elementary school and high   school.
In middle school students don\'t stay   in one classroom all day with one   teacher.
Students change classrooms for   different subjects and have different   teachers.
A common feature of the middle   school is a homeroom.
A homeroom teacher takes   attendance and makes announcements.
After middle school students   continue on to high school.
Going to school is free in the United   States, including high schools.
Students do not need to pay   tuitions, and even textbooks and   lunches are free.
Parents have the choice of sending   their kids to private schools.
Private schools are not free and   have very expensive tuitions.
High school is the last four years of   school that students must attend.
It is required by law that students   attend high school.
High school begin at 9th grade and   finishes at 12th grade.
Some high schools have admission   exams or an application process.
High schools classes are designed   to prepare students for college.
Not every parent looks forward to   the day when their child goes off to   school.
Some parents in fact don\'t send   their children to school at all.
Some parents choose to teach their   children at home.
Teaching your children at home is   called homeschooling.
Parents, caregivers, or private tutors   educate children individually at home.
There are many reasons why some   parents choose to homeschool.
One reason is that some parents do   not feel their children are safe in   school.
Other parents want their child\'s   education to be based on their   religious beliefs.
Being homeschooled doesn\'t mean   a student cannot go to college.
Most colleges will accept students   who were homeschooled.
Parents often don\'t know what   happens to their children while at   school.
Parents rely on what their children   tell them about how they are doing.
Generally schools will host parent-  teacher conferences at least twice a   year.
Parent-teacher conferences are   short meetings between parents and   their children\'s teachers.
The meetings give parents the   opportunity to ask questions.
The schools send out notes to   parents to inform them of parent-  teacher conferences.
Parent-teacher conferences typically   do not last very long.
If a parent needs more time he or   she should try to schedule another   meeting.
Children usually do not go along   with their parents to the meetings.
Teacher will offer advice to parents   on how to support their child\'s   education.
Families choose to pay for their   children\'s education by sending them   to private schools.
There are many different types of   private schools.
Some private schools are boarding   schools where students live on   campus.
Some private schools are affiliated   with a certain religion.
These schools teach a specific faith\'s   beliefs and traditions.
There are schools run by Catholics,   Protestants, Jewish people, Muslims,   and Christians.
Private schools are also called   independent schools or non-state   schools.
Private schools charge tuition   because they do not collect money   from taxes.
Some private schools offer   scholarships to help pay for school.
Many of these scholarships are   given to students who can\'t afford   tuition.
California is the largest state in the   United States of America.
It also has the largest education   system in the country.
The college and university system is   divided into four parts.
The UC system is considered the   more prestigious system in the state.
A degree from the UC system is   highly sought.
The California State Universities   counts 23 universities in its system.
The systems enrollment is approximately 450,000 students.
The California Community Colleges system is the largest in the world.
It boasts 112 campuses, and serves approximately 2.4 million students.
California is home to a large number of privately owned schools.
Driving can be confusing because of the rules, laws, and customs.
People are dependent on their cars to get to work and school.
Most American workers spend an hour driving to work each day.
You have to pass the written test in order get a learner\'s permit.
If you pass the written test, you can practice driving on the road.
The DMV has free booklets you can study for the written test.
A friend can teach you how to drive to pass the road test.
Once you get your driver\'s license, you can drive anywhere in the country.
Wherever you drive, you will see speed limit signs.
Generally you can drive faster on a highway than on local streets.
Pasadena hosts the Rose Parade every year to welcome the new year.
The parade takes place in the center of the city on Colorado Blvd.
The parade features numerous floats, marching bands, and honorees.
The parade is the most popular one in the country.
Many people camp out in tents the night before the parade.
People bring portable heaters to keep them warm from the cold.
People bring their portable grills to cook outdoors.
The floats are beautifully decorated in colorful flowers.
Marching bands from nearby schools participate in the parade.
It is considered a great honor to participate in the Rose Parade.
A selfie is a self-portrait usually taken with a cell phone.
Painters and photographers have always used themselves as subjects.
Now almost everyone walks around with a camera in his or her pocket.
Many people tend to share these photographs with friends and strangers.
People share photographs on social networking websites.
These websites include Instagram, Snapchat, and Facebook.
People usually take selfies when engaged in normal day-to-day activities.
A selfie is usually taken by holding a cell phone at arms length.
Some say that selfies are a sign that people are becoming superficial.
People take selfies by taking a picture of their reflection in a mirror.
Many people live in small apartments in New York City and Los Angeles.
Having a pet is good for teaching children responsibility.
Many landlords forbid tenants from having pets.
The extra fee is to pay for repairs or cleaning caused by the pet.
Some people who live in apartments have pets that are not so ordinary.
Many apartment dwellers choose animals that make little noise as pets.
Some cities have laws banning specific animals as pets.
Some of these less than ordinary pets are frogs and spiders.
New York City has specific laws banning wild animals from residences.
A man in a Manhattan apartment was discovered to have a tiger as a pet.
A wake is when people go to pay their last respects at funeral parlor.
A funeral parlor is where they prepare the corpse for burial.
Part of the preparation is placing the corpse in a coffin for people to see.
Some people have a closed casket wake where you can\'t see the corpse.
More families are choosing not to have traditional wakes.
Deceased persons in wakes are being posed doing something they loved doing.
A family had their dead loved one posed at a table with a cigarette.
One funeral home has become famous for its non-traditional wakes.
They think it helps them remember the dead as they were when they were alive.
Some critics think non-traditional wakes are disrespectful.
It is very common to see homeless people on the streets of Los Angeles.
Homelessness has been a problem since the beginning of the 20th century.
Churches began to establish shelters around the area to help these people.
These shelters remained a refuge for many homeless in the area.
The homeless population is made up of much more than just young men looking for work.
Many economic and social changes have resulted in homelessness.
Homelessness can be a result of substance abuse.
Many homeless have mental disabilities that limit them from finding a job.
Some homeless people are veterans that cannot find the resources to live normal lives.
There has to be individualized attention based on their conditions.
Everyday heroes in the United States are the country\'s paramedics.
Paramedics respond to medical emergencies suffered by citizens.
Paramedics must complete a very extensive physical training program.
A paramedic must be in fit condition, and be mentally strong.
The heroes endure life-threatening situations when responding to emergencies.
In Southern California, there are two primary schools for paramedic training.
Candidates must pass a psychological screening and a physical training program.
Paramedics provide a valuable service to the communities they serve.
Paramedics must be trained to handle all situations.
Paramedics can sent to emergency situations by citizens who call 911.
One of the darkest days in American history was September 11, 2001.
It was the most tragic day in the history of the country.
September 11 was the day Muslim extremists hijacked four jets.
They attempted to destroy the American spirit by crashing the jets.
Three of the four jets reached their targets.
One jet was stopped by the heroes who died defending the country.
More than 3,000 Americans lost their lives on that day.
The American spirit was not suppressed despite the attacks.
Those responsible for the attacks were quickly dealt with.
The country soon began its journey to recovery.
The great California Redwood and Sequoia trees are majestic landscapes.
These trees can be seen up close at Sequoia National Park.
The park is known as the Land of the Giants because of its beautiful trees.
The landscape features the world\'s largest trees.
Sequoia National Park was established as a national park in the 1890s.
It is a great place for a family vacation.
The ancient trees are some of the oldest living organisms on earth.
Redwood trees can reach heights of more than 375 feet.
Redwood trees live up to 2,000 years, and have long branches.
The Giant Sequoia trees can live up to an astonishing 3,000 years.
There are many law enforcement agencies in the United States.
One of the largest agencies in Southern California is LAPD.
The letters LAPD stands for the Los Angeles Police Department.
Another large agency is the Los Angeles County Sheriff\'s Department.
Both of these police forces are some of the largest in the country.
They handle a full-range of police duties ranging from citations to murder.
There are also a number of smaller police agencies.
Because of the unique nature of the state, California Highway Patrol was created.
The CHP patrols the vast number of freeway miles that exist in California.
CHP officers are endowed with the same powers other police officers have.
The Golden Gate Bridge in San Francisco is a recognizable landmark.
The bridge spans the San Francisco Bay, and is part of a network.
Construction on the Golden Gate Bridge began in 1933.
Many people think the bridge was responsible for the country\'s economic recovery.
The bridge connects San Francisco to the San Francisco peninsula.
Before the bridge was built, people had to take a ferry to travel.
Construction of the bridge was controversial at the time.
Many thought the project was simply too complex and dangerous.
The construction plan approved concentrated on the safety of workers.
The Golden Gate Bridge is an iconic and beautiful landmark.
The San Francisco cable car system is a historic landmark.
It is the world\'s only, manually operated cable car system.
It is run by the San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency.
The system dates back to 1878, when the California Street line first opened.
There are three lines currently operating in the city.
The open-air cars are a major tourist attraction.
Cable cars were first used in the city because of its landscape.
San Francisco is very hilly, which makes it hard for bus travel.
The solution for this problem was the cable car.
The best feature of these cars is the pure fun they are to ride.
Car chases in the Los Angeles area are a regular occurrence.
In 2013 there were over 700 car chases in Los Angeles.
Car chases have become a source of entertainment.
Many car chases are captured on video and broadcast live.
These car chases are captured with the help of a helicopter.
The helicopter follows and films the chase through the streets.
Car chases are intense and filled with drama.
Police are not happy with the media covering car chases live.
Police worry that people trying to escape enjoy the attention.
The media insists they have the right to show car chases.
Places associated with death are often popular in Los Angeles.
One such popular place is the Department of Medical Examiner-Coroner.
When the cause of death is undetermined, the body is examined.
It is the coroner\'s job to determine the time, cause, and manner of death.
Sometimes the coroner has to perform an autopsy.
An autopsy is an operation on a dead body.
They try to figure out how the person died.
A good number of famous people have been examined there.
Some of those people include Marilyn Monroe, Robert F. Kennedy, and Michael Jackson.
There is even a gift shop at the Los Angeles Coroner\'s Office.
Museum Mile is one of New York City\'s most famous avenues.
It holds some of the most famous museums in the world.
Museum Mile begins at 85th Street and Fifth Avenue.
The Metropolitan Museum of Art is one of these museums.
There is a rooftop garden where there are spectacular views of the city.
A visitor can visit an entire Egyptian tomb.
There is even a gallery featuring musical instruments.
The swirling architecture was thought to be ugly by many.
The building looks a little bit like a snail\'s shell from the outside.
The museum focuses on modern art, but sometimes features special exhibits.
The Empire State Building is a famous building in New York City.
Many people think it is the tallest building in the world.
The Empire State Building is 1,454 feet tall.
The Empire State building is the fourth tallest building in the U.S.
Inside the building is mostly occupied by offices and stores.
There is an observation deck on the top of the building.
From the top there are beautiful views of New York City, especially at night.
In 1933 the building was featured in the movie King Kong.
The building was also in the movie Sleepless in Seattle.
In 1945, a small plane crashed into the building.
The full name of the Statue of Liberty is "The Statue of Liberty Enlightening the World".
The Statue of Liberty is a symbol of freedom for many immigrants.
Lady Liberty was a sign to tell immigrants that they had made it to America.
Lady Liberty was not always the color green.
The years have caused the statue to change colors.
The statue was a 100th birthday gift from France to the United States.
It is located on Liberty Island right off the southern tip of Manhattan.
To get to the crown, people have to climb 377 steps.
About four million people visit the Statue of Liberty every year.
People used to be able to climb up to the torch of the statue.
Rockefeller Center is a complex of 19 buildings.
It is named after a famous business magnate.
The most famous building in the complex is the General Electric building.
It is in the middle of Manhattan between Fifth and Sixth Avenues.
Saturday Night Live, a popular American late night show, is filmed there.
Visitors to Rockefeller Center can visit the plaza.
The plaza becomes an ice skating rink in the winter.
Every year a huge Christmas tree is placed in the plaza.
Thousands of people attend the tree lighting ceremony.
Radio City Music Hall is another famous building in Rockefeller Center.
Manhattan is a small island that is one part of New York City.
New York City is made up of five sections called boroughs.
These boroughs are Manhattan, Queens, Brooklyn, Staten Island, and the Bronx.
Manhattan has the most people of all the boroughs.
Because the island is small, most people live and work in tall buildings.
Tall buildings are called skyscrapers because they seem to touch the sky.
Manhattan is connected to the other boroughs by a series of bridges and tunnels.
The New York City subway is a massive mass transit system.
One of the most famous parts of Manhattan is Times Square.
Times Square is called the crossroads of the world.
For many years, gambling was legal only in the state of Nevada.
Nevada is a western state that is east of California.
It is a desert state where little rain falls during the year.
It is a little more than 275 miles from the city of Los Angeles.
Driving from Los Angeles to Las Vegas is about four hours.
Las Vegas was established by the Mexicans in the mid-1800s.
Las Vegas is now a gambling town, where people come to vacation.
Las Vegas is the 30th largest city in the country.
Its original population in 1905 was only 5,000.
Much of the city\'s growth is due to the gambling industry.
Mr. Rogers\' Neighborhood was a successful children\'s show.
Public TV differs from the more common commercial television.
Public Television is dedicated to bringing alternative programming to the people.
Mr. Rogers\' Neighborhood ran from February 1968 through August 2001.
It is often referred to as the Mr. Rogers show.
It was a half-hour children\'s show that featured the popular Rogers as host.
Rogers style and calm demeanor was well-liked by both children and adults.
Fred Rogers was also a human rights advocate.
Rogers was inducted into the Television Hall of fame.
He had also received approximately 40 honorary degrees.
Cinco de Mayo is a holiday celebrating Mexican Independence Day.
The Latino population is the largest ethnic group in the country.
The population accounts for 17 percent of the nation\'s population.
63 percent of those Latinos are of Mexican origins.
Cinco de Mayo is a large celebration in the country\'s southwest region.
The day celebrates the Mexican victory in the Battle of Puebla.
Cinco de Mayo is celebrated more in the U.S than in Mexico.
In Los Angeles, the city celebrates the event with the Fiesta Broadway.
Fiesta Broadway is the largest Cinco de Mayo celebration in the world.
The Single de Mayo is an annual charity event that began in 1999.
The U.S was attacked by the Imperial Japanese Navy at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii.
The surprise attack was intended to destroy the American Pacific Fleet.
The attack was coordinated in the Philippines, Malasysia, Singapore, and Hong Kong.
Pearl Harbor was attacked by over 350 Japanese airplane fighters.
The early-morning attack sank four U.S. battleships.
The country was in shock at the news of the disaster.
President Franklin Roosevelt called the attack cowardly.
December 7th was said to be "A day that will live in infamy."
On December 8, the United States formally declared war on Japan.
The country became involved in the greatest war in history.
America is one of the most diversified countries in the world.
America is comprised of many different cultures from around the world.
All these cultures have come together to create a new culture.
Funeral traditions have become adopted by different cultures.
Traditional American funerals include some sort of religious ritual.
This is followed by a procession to the burial grounds.
An obituary is a death announcement in a newspaper.
At the church service, the deceased is usually eulogized by friends and family.
The deceased is given a blessing from a member of the clergy.
Most cultures have adopted this traditional American funeral ritual.
November 22, 1963 is a significant date in American history.
On this date, President John Kennedy was assassinated in Dallas.
The president was visiting Texas for the first time since his inauguration.
Kennedy was one of the most popular presidents in American history.
His death shocked the nation because it was broadcast live.
Kennedy was warned not to ride in an open-air car by his bodyguards.
Kennedy did not want to be hidden behind an armored car.
Lee Harvey Oswald was the person who assassinated the president.
Police say Oswald shot the president from a building.
Kennedy was the youngest man ever to reach the presidency.
Social class is generally defined by how much money they make.
There are three classes: poor, middle class, and rich.
Some believe there is another class called working class.
The working class is between the poor and middle class.
American culture is based on the idea that people can move up the economic ladder.
High-paying jobs usually require a high-level education.
Higher education needed to get a good paying job is expensive.
Moving up the class ladder is not an easy task.
Factors such as race and gender play a role in succeeding.
For some people, class is something you are born with.
Rosa Parks is an example of how an ordinary American can change the world.
Parks became famous for challenging a discriminatory policy in Alabama.
Black Americans were not allowed to ride in the front seats of public buses.
Blacks were expected to go to the back of a bus.
Parks refused to surrender her seat to a white passenger.
Parks was arrested, and charged with civil disobedience.
Parks became a national symbol for the Civil Rights Movement.
She was called the First Lady of Civil Rights.
She was honored with her own museum in Michigan.
She received several civil rights awards both before and after her death.
Chicago is known as the "Windy City" because of the breeze that blows constantly.
Lake Michigan is the fifth largest freshwater body in the world.
Chicago is located in Illinois on the shore of one of the Great Lakes.
Skyscrapers are an important part of Chicago\'s history.
The first skyscraper in the United States was built in Chicago in 1884.
Chicago is the third most populous city in the United States.
More than two and a half million people live in the city of Chicago.
President Barack Obama used to live in Chicago.
Nearly 40 million people visit Chicago every year.
The Willis Tower is the tallest building in the Western Hemisphere.
Boston is the largest city in the state of Massachusetts.
Over 12 million people visit the city every year.
Boston was founded in 1630 by English colonists fleeing religious persecution.
The American Revolution began in Boston with the Battle of Lexington.
Colonists dumped the British tea into the harbor to protest taxes.
Boston has the oldest subway system in the United States.
America\'s first public school was founded in Boston in 1635.
Boston Common is the oldest public park in the United States.
Boston is also well known for many universities that surround it.
Some of the most famous universities in Boston are Harvard and MIT.
The American Revolution was a war of independence.
It was fought by those living in the colonies against Great Britain.
Those living in the colonies were especially angry about taxes.
Taxes were unfair because the colonies have no representation in the British parliament.
They called this "taxation without representation".
The colonists who wanted freedom from English rule were known as Patriots.
Those who supported British rule were known as Loyalists.
Many people were involved in the struggle for independence.
George Washington was the commander in chief of the patriot army.
Great Britain recognized the United States as an independent nation in 1783.
The American Civil War happened from 1861 to 1865.
The main cause was that Southern states did not want to be told what to do.
This was especially true about two issues, taxes and slavery.
The Southern economy was based on agriculture.
The agricultural economy was reliant on the labor of enslaved Africans.
Southerners felt the abolitionists were threatening their way of life.
The Civil War was the bloodiest war fought inside the United States.
One of the bloodiest battles was the Battle of Gettysburg.
Emancipation Proclamation declared the freedom of slaves in America.
The Civil War ended in 1865 after the Confederate Army surrendered.
Fires are destructive and also create changes.
In 1871 a fire burned most of Chicago to the ground.
Most of the city at the time was built of wood.
This, combined with winds and drought, made the city burn down quickly.
The Great Boston Fire of 1872 created a property damage of $73.5 million.
Most of Downtown Boston and the financial district burned down in the fire.
Thousands of people lost their jobs and their homes.
Many people began protesting poor working conditions.
The city began enforcing building regulations because of the fire.
The U.S. Congress passed laws improving factory safety conditions.
Salem in the state of Massachusetts is called the "Witch City".
In 1692 to 1693 an infamous set of trials happened.
These trials are known as The Salem Witch Trials.
The Salem Witch Trials accused more than 200 people of being witches.
Among the accused were women, men, and even children.
There was never proof that those accused and convicted were really witches.
The Salem Witch Trials have become a part of the city\'s history.
Many people visit Salem around Halloween.
The city uses its past to teach tolerance.
There is a memorial dedicated to the innocent people who died.
The United Nations is an international organization founded in 1945.
The UN was started\u00A0after the Second World War by 51 countries.
The UN\'s headquarters is located in New York City.
Technically anyone who visits the headquarters is not in the United States anymore.
The land and buildings of the UN are considered international territory.
Six official languages are used at the United Nations.
They are Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Russian, and Spanish.
UN rules override the laws of New York City.
There is no immunity to those who commit crimes in the United Nations.
You don\'t need to be a diplomat to visit the United Nations.
New York City is widely known as "The Big Apple".
There are many legends about how the city got its name.
The name "Big Apple" has its roots in show business.
A large number of unemployed sold apples on the streets.
A reporter called the big prize the big apple.
The "big apple" soon was used to mean any big city.
New York was the heart of the jazz music scene in the 1930\'s.
In Harlem there was a club called "The Big Apple".
There is a street corner in Manhattan called "Big Apple Corner".
The origins of the "Big Apple" nickname are unclear.
The World Trade Center opened in New York City in 1973.
The most famous buildings were the Twin Towers.
The two buildings were almost exactly the same.
The only difference was that one had an antenna on the top.
When the towers were built, they were the tallest in the world.
On the top floor there was a restaurant called "Windows on the World".
The World Trade Center was so large that it had its own zip code.
The skyline and spirit of New York City were changed after September 11, 2001.
That morning two planes crashed into the World Trade Center.
It took eight months for the site to be cleaned.
In the middle of Manhattan Island is the most visited park in America.
Central Park is a National Historical Landmark.
It\'s a green space where people go to escape the noise of urban life.
People lived on that land were forced off to construct the park.
One section of the park is called Sheep Meadow.
It\'s a grassy area where people can lie in the sun.
Actual sheep used to graze in Sheep Meadow.
There are a number of small lakes in the park.
One of the lakes rents out small mechanical sailboats.
There is also a puppet theater and a carousel for kids.
The Marlboro Man was a fictional character who appeared in ads.
The ads ran on television from 1964 through 1999.
The Marlboro Man entered the collective conscience of the American people.
Philip Morris is one of the largest tobacco producing companies in the world.
The corporation used the Marlboro Man with great success over the years.
The Marlboro Man was a rugged-looking man who rode a mighty horse.
He traveled throughout the country promoting tobacco products.
He appeared in television, radio, print, and billboard ads for decades.
The Marlboro Man is still popular in some parts of Europe and Japan.
The surgeon general required all cigarette companies to place a warning label.
The Beatles are the greatest band in history.
The Beatles were made up by four of the finest musicians.
The Beatle\'s names were John, Paul, George, and Ringo.
The group\'s success opened the door for other British bands.
The group became the biggest Rock \'N\' Roll band to hit America.
John Lennon was the leader of the Beatles.
John and Paul wrote the majority of the group\'s songs.
The group\'s first appearance was seen by over 73 million viewers.
The Beatles unfortunately broke up in 1970 after many problems.
The Beatles\' disbandment marked the end of an era.
The Griffith Observatory is a planetarium located in Los Angeles\'s Griffith Park.
It features several astronomical displays and telescopes.
Griffith was a philanthropist and mining tycoon.
He wanted to give the public a state-of-the-art observatory.
Common people should be able to enjoy the wonders of the universe.
The planetarium receives more than 13,000 visitors a day.
The observatory has a striking view of Los Angeles and Hollywood.
The observatory frequently stages viewing nights when people could bring telescopes.
Griffith Observatory is open daily, and remains free of charge.
The Pacific Ocean can be seen on clear days from the observatory.
The United States is a country that has people from all over the world.
Many people in the United States practice different religions.
Most people in the U.S. identify as being Christian.
The second most popular religion in America is Judaism.
The third most common religion in the U.S. is Islam.
Other religions practiced in the U.S include Hinduism, and Buddhism.
About 20 percent of people in America say they don\'t practice any religion.
One of the founding principles of the United States is religious freedom.
Many people use what they wear to reflect their religious beliefs.
Islamic women wear a scarf called "hijab" to cover their head.
Woodstock was an American music and art celebration.
It was a defining event for the young generation of Americans of the time.
The 1960s was an impactful era in American history.
Many events took place during those controversial 10 years.
The war in Vietnam was raging in the late 60s.
The popular president, John F. Kennedy was assassinated in 1963.
There were more historic events that deeply divided the country.
Woodstock showed how the young generation can coexist with the older.
The biggest names in rock history performed at the three-day event.
More than 400,000 young people gathered at Woodstock.
The Department of Veterans Affairs provides services for all veterans.
It was formed in July, 1930, and employs 280,000 people.
Its annual budget for the 2014 fiscal year is nearly $153 billion.
It\'s one of the largest government agencies in existence today.
The Department is broken into three main subdivisions.
The VA has served the veterans from several wars.
It has continued the tradition of serving former military members.
They provide services for veterans who need help readjusting to civilian life.
The VA\u00A0now provides additional services such as educational benefits.
It also helps those veterans who have become homeless.
Married with Children was an impactful television show in America.
The show aired on the FOX Channel for 11 years.
The show was responsible for keeping the news station alive.
In 1987, TV in the United States was dominated by the big three.
The big three companies are ABC, NBC, and CBS.
Few people gave the FOX Channel a chance when it began.
The show followed the exploits of a dysfunctional family.
The father was a lovable loser living with his wife, and kids
It was a controversial show that dealt with controversial subjects.
Many people boycotted the show because of its racy content.
A recent social change taking place in America is social networking.
Social networking in itself is not a new development.
These types of groups have been in existence for at least 150 years.
In the times before computers, social networking was done in person.
Social networking websites first appeared during the late 1990s.
The first major social networking website in America was MySpace.
Facebook was originally a website created for use by Harvard University students.
Facebook is a social networking site that has grown incredibly fast.
Facebook has revolutionized the way people stay connected.
Once you get started, making new friends will come easily.
In the United States, people love to throw parties.
You need to make sure you are actually invited to the party.
It\'s considered rude to just show up without being invited.
It\'s important to be relatively punctual for a party.
Going to parties is a good way to socialize with people.
Many people like to be "fashionably late" at parties.
People like to do this to make a big entrance.
It\'s polite to bring a gift even if it isn\'t a birthday party.
The gift does not need to be too fancy.
A bottle of wine or even flowers will be appreciated.
A bridal shower is a party where a woman receives gifts.
Bridal showers are given to women who are about get married.
A bride-to-be often registers at department stores.
Registering creates a list of things for people to buy at the store.
This makes it easy for guests to know what gift to get.
Cash or checks are considered appropriate gifts for a bridal shower.
The money comes in handy to help pay for an expensive wedding.
A bridal shower can be small and intimate.
It can also be a larger affair held at a restaurant.
Traditionally bridal showers were women only affairs.
Baby showers usually come as a complete surprise.
A baby shower is a party where a pregnant woman is "showered" with gifts.
A baby shower is usually given by a close female friend.
Sometimes co-workers will also throw a baby shower for a friend.
The baby shower is given between 6 and 9 months of pregnancy.
A baby shower can be held in someone\'s home or outside.
Traditionally only women are invited to a baby shower.
People can put cards inside with wishes for the new baby and mom.
Most of these cards also contain money or gift cards to help the mom-to-be.
Another game has people taste baby food and guess the flavor.
A housewarming party is thrown when someone moves into a new home.
The party gives friends and family the chance to congratulate.
The people who move in are the ones who throw the party.
It is an opportunity to fill the new home with love and presents.
It is traditional to bring a gift to a housewarming party.
You can also bring food or drinks to share with the other guests.
This is often appreciated since there isn\'t a lot of food served.
There are usually no planned activities at a housewarming parties.
The hostess of the party will give the guests a tour of the new home.
Housewarming parties get their name because people used to bring firewood.
A wedding reception is a party held after the marriage ceremony.
Usually there is a little time between the ceremony and the reception.
This gives people enough time to travel between locations.
Catering halls are places that specialize in hosting big parties.
Most wedding receptions are held at catering halls.
Wedding receptions aren\'t usually held at the same place as the ceremony.
Wedding receptions can be held in restaurants or parks.
At a wedding reception the seating is usually prearranged.
There is a special table for the bride and groom.
Some receptions have an open bar, meaning the alcohol is free.
There can be different kinds of entertainment at a wedding reception.
Usually there will be a Master of Ceremonies who makes announcements.
The MC will announce when the newly married couple enters the reception hall.
A wedding reception usually has music, and guests are expected to dance.
The music can be provided by a DJ or by a live band.
Food at a wedding reception can be buffet style.
Sometimes the DJ or live band will accept requests for songs.
Sometimes the bride will share a dance with her father.
After these special dances, the guests are invited to the dance floor.
The new couple is usually very busy greeting all of their guests.
There are many traditions to follow after a wedding.
A well-known tradition is for a bride to toss her bridal bouquet.
Unmarried female guests attending her reception catch the bouquet.
The single woman who catches the bouquet will be the next to get married.
Many women take the flower toss very seriously.
Girls sometimes even fight each other for the bridal bouquet.
The groom also has something to toss at the wedding reception.
The groom takes a garter from his new wife\'s leg and tosses it.
The single man who catches the garter will be the next one to get married.
The bride and groom toast each other with champagne before the end of the reception.
Theme parties are based on an idea like a television show.
Guests are expected to dress according to the theme as well.
The Toga party is an example of a theme party.
Toga parties used to be popular among college students.
In a masquerade party everyone wears a mask.
Some adults throw parties based on seasons.
A summer beach party might feature guests wearing their swimsuits.
Another theme party could focus on a specific region or country.
Guests should be careful when dressing up for these types of theme parties.
Dressing up like a certain ethnic group can be considered offensive.
The parenting styles of parents are often criticized.
One type of parenting that is criticized is a helicopter parent.
These kinds of parents hover over their children like helicopters.
Helicopter parents take things to the extreme.
The actions of helicopter parents actually hurt children.
Helicopter parents are overly worried about their kids getting hurt.
The opposite of the helicopter mom is the free-range mom.
The free-range mom follows a slow parenting style.
The free-range parents believe kids should have freedom.
A free-range mom will let her child play in a park.
One style of parenting keeps small children as physically attached as possible.
Having your child physically attached to you is called attachment parenting.
Parents are encouraged to be close to their babies.
Parents are also encouraged to sleep with their babies.
Parents are told to bring the baby into the adult bed.
This is supposed to teach the baby about sleep regulation.
The co-sleeping between a parent and child is controversial.
There are concerns that babies sleeping with adults could suffocate.
Attachment parenting doesn\'t worry about spoiling a child.
Attachment parenting feels a baby\'s cry should be responded to.
Not all kids\' birthday parties are created equal.
Sometimes it seems that birthday parties are about showing off.
Birthday parties are held in the home of the birthday boy or girl.
It used to be that children\'s parties were just for children.
Parents would drop their kids off and come back later.
Now it is common for the parents to stay for the party as well.
This gives the adults time and space to socialize.
Kids and adults don\'t always have the same tastes in food.
Not everyone likes this trend of adults and children partying together.
Some feel that the parties should be kept separate.
At eighteen a person legally becomes an adult in the United States.
An 18-year-old cannot buy alcoholic beverages.
At the age of 18, they can serve in the military and go to war.
An 18-year-old can buy cigarettes and other tobacco products.
People need to wait until they are 21 to buy alcohol.
At the age of 18, people can legally live on their own.
People usually graduate from high school at the age of 18.
Some parents expect their children to move out as soon as they turn 18.
Some adult children are returning to their parents\' home in their 20s and 30s.
It is considered acceptable for a female to stay living with her parents after her 18th birthday.
The baby boomer generation was born after World War II.
Those babies are now reaching the retirement age.
Many of their children worry about taking care of them.
It isn\'t common for multiple generations to live under one roof.
Once children grow up and get married, they move out.
They leave aging parents to fend for themselves.
Aging parents are sometimes put in a nursing home.
A nursing home is a facility that offers care for the elderly.
Most nursing homes have social activities for the elderly.
These activities range from dance classes to movie nights.
The stereotype is that Americans are lazy.
Other countries have much more vacation time.
A worker gets two or three weeks off out of a year.
The vacation time usually have to be spread out throughout the year.
They are expected to be in communication with their boss during the vacation.
They need to check their emails and turn on their mobile phones.
In Germany many people have six weeks of paid vacation.
Most American families tend to stay closer to home and rarely leave the country.
There is no federal law requiring employers to give workers paid vacation.
Workers worry about going on vacation and returning to a mountain of work.
Many people in the United States spend their vacation camping.
Camping involves people leaving the comfort of their home.
When people camp, they can sleep in a tent.
Some people drive in a recreational vehicle or RV.
Inside a RV there are beds, a tiny bathroom, and a kitchen.
People can sleep in a tent, a camper, or a cabin.
There are campgrounds all over the United States.
Many of these campgrounds have water hoses and electric hookups.
Most campsites have a fire ring where people can safely make a fire.
There usually is a picnic table for people to eat their meals.
Having your own space is a sign of success in the United States.
There are a number of steps you need to take in renting an apartment.
You need to figure out how much you can pay per month.
Landlords expect the tenant to pay a security deposit.
The security deposit is usually equal to the amount of one month rent.
Most landlords rent out apartments on an annual basis.
You will sign a document called a lease.
The lease says you will stay in the property for one year and pay rent.
If you break the lease, there are usually fines you have to pay.
The landlord can legally use your security deposit to fix the apartment.
You will set a date to view the place you are interested in renting.
Most landlords are companies that own a number of properties.
On that date you can see the apartment and ask questions.
Some landlords require you to fill out an application.
Landlords want to have responsible tenants who will pay rent on time.
Most landlords will also run a credit check.
The co-signer is legally responsible for paying the rent if you stop paying.
If you cannot afford a full apartment, you can rent a room in someone\'s home.
Most apartments and rooms are unfurnished.
You are expected to bring your own furniture.
If you want to rent an apartment, you need to sign a lease.
Some landlords will only take a certified check or money order.
If you pay your rent late, there is usually a late fee.
The amount of the late fee is written in the lease.
Some leases are on a month-to-month basis.
The lease will tell you how much the monthly rent is.
The security deposit is usually the amount of one month\'s rent.
Many landlords do not allow you to even make holes in the wall.
A lease is proof that you legally live somewhere.
Make sure you get a copy of the signed lease.
You need to check the lease for rules and responsibilities.
Some landlords do not want you to have guests spend the night.
If your friends damage the apartment, you will be responsible.
A friend who stays for a long time can become another tenant.
If you want cable or Internet, you will have to call those companies.
The utilities the landlord pays for will be listed in the lease.
You are responsible for the utilities you use while renting an apartment.
You will have to pay for the electricity and gas you use.
Your landlord has access to the apartment you are renting from them.
The landlord inspects the apartment to make sure you are following the rules.
There are a number of public housing options in the United States.
Public housing options are run by the federal, state, and city government agencies.
Not all public housing options mean living in run-down buildings.
Public housing programs come in all sizes and types.
One type of public housing is a single-family house.
Another type of public housing includes living in a high-rise building.
All public housing options are rental options.
Eligibility for public housing is based on a number of factors.
References are checked to see if you will be a good tenant.
You can find your local housing assistance office by looking online.
In your application you need to give the address of where you currently live.
You need to explain why you think you qualify for public housing help.
The government will want to know if you are a good tenant.
The government needs the contact information of your current and past landlords.
The government needs to know how much money you make in a year.
The government may visit you in your current home and interview you.
If you are eligible for public housing assistance, you will get a letter.
If you are approved, you\'ll be put on a waiting list.
You may be on the waiting list until you move into a public housing unit.
There are many people applying and eligible for help.
Section 8 is also called the housing choice voucher program.
Families who qualify do not get a complete free ride.
You must be able to pay about 30 percent of the rent yourself.
The rest of the rent is paid directly by the government to a landlord.
Not every landlord will accept Section 8.
It is your responsibility to find a landlord who will accept Section 8.
You must be a citizen or a legal resident of the United States to qualify.
You will have to give proof of how much you make.
You will have to fill out an application to see if you qualify.
If you qualify, you will probably be put on a waiting list.
Baseball is the oldest major league sport in the country.
Major League Baseball traces its roots back to the 1880s.
One theory is that the game was based on the British game of cricket.
Cricket is a very popular sport in England.
In any event, the game became very popular in the United States.
The greatest single team in either league\'s history is the New York Yankees.
The Yankees have won more World Series titles than any other team in history.
The Boston Americans won the first World Series beating the Pittsburgh Pirates.
The first team to win four games is declared the World Series Champion.
To date, the Yankees have won 27 championships in 40 appearances.
